source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000<tab>What is it!? Can you not see that I am terribly busy?
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000<tab>「錬金術」師の私に用か？
……手が離せんので、手短にな。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_Q1_000_1<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_Q1_000_1<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A1_000_1<tab>What do you do here?
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A1_000_1<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A1_000_2<tab>What does an alchemist do?
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A1_000_2<tab>「錬金術」とは何か？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A1_000_3<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A1_000_3<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_010<tab>What do I do here? Well, I certainly don't stand around answering fanciful questions! ...But I can see you plan to pester me until I do.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_010<tab>なんだ唐突に。
私のことを覚える余裕があるなら、
その頭をわけてほしいものだが……まあいい。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_011<tab>I am Severian, and, by some twist of fate's unfathomable humor, I serve as guildmaster to this insufferable gathering of alchemists.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_011<tab>私は、セヴェリアン。
つまらん理由で、錬金術師ギルドの「ギルドマスター」を
任されている……。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_012<tab>Were you expecting a joyous union of cooperation and camaraderie? Hmph. Most of these fellows began as bitter rivals, and few of them are eager to share the results of their research.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_012<tab>人望なんぞ求めるなよ？
もとより、ここの連中は研究のライバル同士。
馴れ合いを好まない奴が大半だ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_013<tab>It seems the only thing we can agree on is punishing the detestable practice of peddling false potions. Ruins our collective reputation, you understand. It is quite a sight to see the apprehended criminal subjected to a veritable shower of experimental concoctions!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_013<tab>団結するとしたら……偽薬が出回ったときくらいか。
捕まえた犯人に、それぞれが開発中の新薬を手にして
にじり寄る光景は、なかなか壮観だぞぅ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_020<tab>To properly define the intricate and miraculous work of an alchemist would take days of lengthy explanation─an explanation that you would most likely fail to understand. The simple appellation of “potion brewer” given to us by the masses is, however, largely accurate.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_020<tab>それを正しく語るには、大変な時間を要するのだが……
現代においては「薬を作る者」と定義して、
ほぼ間違いなかろう。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_021<tab>Restorative salves, ability-enhancing elixirs, deadly toxins and poisons─these are all substances that can be created through our versatile and practical profession.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_021<tab>身体を癒す薬、能力を向上させる薬、そして毒薬……。
多種多様な薬が、錬金術によって生み出される。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_022<tab>With the proper knowledge and process, even the most worthless-seeming materials can be combined to produce wondrous compounds. The applications of alchemy are nearly limitless!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_022<tab>無価値に思える素材ですら、正しく理解し掛け合わせれば、
新たな可能性を得るのだ！
ふふふ……とんでもなく深いだろう？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_050<tab>Ah, my faithful assistant. Have you come to share some wonderful discovery from the boundless realm of alchemical potential?
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_050<tab>ん？　どうした、助手よ。
何かとっておきの発見でもしたか？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_060<tab>Ah, my faithful assistant. Though the details have quite slipped my mind, I was told you were involved in some outrageous incident at the royal palace. Why waste your time on such frivolities, when you could be exploring the uncharted regions of advanced alchemy!?
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_060<tab>助手よ、詳細はさっぱり忘れたが、
王宮で派手なことをやらかしたらしいな？
そんな暇があったら、新たな研究に勤しめばいいものを！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_061<tab>If any seek to interrupt your research, then you need merely douse the knave with the most suitable concoction at hand! Mwahaha! The practical application of results is at the heart of our discipline!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_061<tab>だいたい、お前を阻む者がいるのならば、
ちょっとした薬を調合して、盛ってやればいいだろう。
ふはは！　研究の成果は、存分に活用するべきだな！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_065<tab>Ah, my assistant. I trust you are applying the same diligence you showed in my service to your work in Revenant's Toll?
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_065<tab>助手よ、レヴナンツトールでの仕事は順調か？
まあ、この私の課した高い要求に、悉く応えてきたお前のことだ。
特に心配はしていないがな！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_066<tab>Good, good. Wiltwaek himself is an unremarkable mind, but he has a habit of bringing the most fascinating problems to my attention. Devote yourself to this investigation, and you may well stumble upon new concepts.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_066<tab>あの大男……ウィルトウェークは凡俗の輩だが、
時折、面白い話を持ってくる。
奴の野暮用が思わぬ着想を生むかもしれん……真剣に取り組め！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_070<tab>I have heard the case in Revenant's Toll is closed. More importantly, it was my spectrolium that proved Waoud's guilt. I cannot say I am surprised─even barely tested, the fruit of my genius was bound to save the day.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_070<tab>レヴナンツトールでの事件は、無事に解決したそうだな。
私の試薬も、ひと役買ったと聞いているぞ。
実は、ろくに試験もせず渡したのだが、問題なく使えただろう？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_071<tab>Every problem presents an opportunity, my assistant. Those of us who seek to unveil the truth must understand why problems arise, as well as how to solve them.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_071<tab>ふふふ……助手よ、お前にはもはや説明の必要もあるまい？
万が一、問題が起きたら、それはそれで面白い展開が見られる……
かかる実験精神こそ、我ら求道の徒に欠かせぬ資質なのだ！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_080<tab>Seven hells take that damnable receptionist! Is there no end to her rampant stupidity? Only one so daft as she could possibly see fit to waste my time with such meaningless and mundane chores. Me! The very incarnation of alchemical omniscience!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_080<tab>まったく……愚鈍な受付め。
錬金術師の叡智たる私の頭脳を、
枝葉末節な雑用に使わせるなというのに。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_081<tab>Well, I do believe this to be one of rare instances I have something not entirely hateful to say about our dear fool receptionist. She tends to bore me with nothing but the most inane of tasks, but of late she has managed to pique my curiosity. A corpse that does not rot? The mere thought is enough to tickle every fancy I have.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_081<tab>あの受付め……伝書鳩以下のうつけに過ぎないと思っていたが、
今回ばかりは、良い依頼を持ってきてくれたと言わざるを得ない。
朽ちぬ死体……好奇心を刺激される、甘美な響きだとは思わないか？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_082<tab>Heartstrike... I have heard its name, and of its powers. For an age I have dismissed it is as the stuff of bedtime tales, so absurd it sounded. But to think that it truly exists... Remarkable. Simply remarkable.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_082<tab>「心の臓の刃」……か。
取るに足らん戯言の類いと捨て置いていたが、
よもや実在していたとはな。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_083<tab>And so now we know the true power of the blade what was known as Heartstrike. In its weakened state, it served only to keep death at bay, not grant life anew. In that, it was nothing more than the dark fixation of those with morbid minds. So it was, and so be it.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_083<tab>「心の臓の刃」の正体は、死人をゾンビーにするだけの、
悪趣味な愚物に過ぎなかった。
だが、それでいいのだ……。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_084<tab>We have all lost those who were dear to us. Those we love. Those we cherish. Those without whom the very thought of passing our days seems unbearable. That is a weakness in us that we must face and conquer. For that very struggle is a part of this miracle we call life.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_084<tab>大切な者を亡くした我々は、
この弱さと向き合いながら生きて行くしかないのだろう……。
それが、人間というものなのだ……。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_085<tab>My loyal lackey! Your allies in the Scions have come seeking my alchemical genius! 'Twould seem I may be their only hope in understanding how the soul of a person not lost to Thal's cold halls could vanish so completely and abruptly!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_085<tab>助手よ、「暁」なる組織が、魂について私に問うてきた。
なんでも、死してエーテル界に還ったわけでもなく、
魂の痕跡がプツリと消えてしまったというのだ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_086<tab>Hm hm hm. Heh heh heh. Mwahahahahaha...I honestly have no idea. There is much even alchemy has yet to explain about the mysteries of life and death.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_086<tab>……ふふふ……ふふ、ふはははは！
正直……見当もつかん。
私もまだまだ、魂の神秘には考察を欠くようだ……。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_090<tab>I received the most curious missive from the Rising Stones regarding the Scions. Something about rifts in time... Would that I were familiar with such theorems. It sounds as though it would make for a rather intriguing field research.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_090<tab>助手よ、賢人たちの魂の件だが、
「暁」より報告書が回ってきたものの、何度読んでも理解できん。
次元の狭間を超えた事象など、さすがに専門外なのでな……。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_091<tab>Well, my able assistant, it would seem your Scion allies have returned from their jaunt across the rift. 'Tis a powerful magick indeed that could send living souls to distant worlds. Though it lies somewhat beyond the realm of alchemy, you may consider my curiosity piqued.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_091<tab>助手よ、「暁」の賢人たちが異世界から帰還したようだな。
次元の狭間を渡ったその技法、魂の神秘に迫る一端として、
詳しく教えてもらいたいものだ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_092<tab>Heh heh heh... Eagerly have I awaited your arrival, my most able assistant! A little bird tells me you journeyed to the birthplace of alchemy─to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han! Come, you must share with me the wonders you have witnessed!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_092<tab>ふふふ……助手よ、待っていたぞ！
錬金術発祥の地、ラザハンへ行ったそうだな？
さあ語れ、お前の好奇心を刺激する発見はあったか？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_Q2_000_001<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_Q2_000_001<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A2_000_001<tab>How do you fare?
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A2_000_001<tab>近況について

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A2_000_002<tab>What can you tell me of alchemy?
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A2_000_002<tab>「錬金術」とは何か？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_A2_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_100<tab>Hah! Despite all the myriad possibilities of our craft that beg to be explored, you would inquire as to <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> well-being? Well, naturally I am spending every waking hour exploring the myriad possibilities of our craft!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_100<tab>ははは！　何かと思えば、最近の調子だと？
……もちろん、朝から晩まで、
怪しげな素材をこねくりまわしているに決まっているだろう！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_101<tab>Though I have stood at what I thought to be the very peak of alchemical achievement, it was but one mountain among many that I now hope to conquer. And, as I work towards my goals, I even deign to accept a commission or two.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_101<tab>究極の錬金術を終えても、錬金術には未知の可能性がある。
新たな目標を選定しがてら、
その日の気分で依頼を請けるのも、悪くないぞぅ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_102<tab><sigh> I only wish that the requests of the wealthy were not so insufferably dull. If coin is no object, then why not ask of me a truly daunting and difficult task?
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_102<tab>しかし、金持ちどもが持ち込んでくる依頼は退屈でな。
どうせ金が余っているのなら、
もっと目が血走るような難題を持ってこいと言ってやった！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_103<tab>Have you made no boastworthy discoveries of late? Remember: the world is our crucible, and an alchemist makes marvels of the mundane!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_103<tab>……お前は今日、何を見つけた？
万物は我らの素材……人の知は、濁水から澄んだ水を生む。
それを心に留める限り、お前はいつでも私の助手だ！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_105<tab>I have taken an interest in these so-called “clones” of which you spoke. Fascinating things, really. Mayhap I will begin research in earnest...
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_105<tab>私の近況だと？
実はお前が持ち込んだ奇妙な事件がきっかけで、アラグの遺産……
人造生命体「クローン」とやらに興味を持ったぞ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_106<tab>Hahaha! I say this in jest, of course. I already know more of Allagan magicks than most historians, having chased the notion of creating life as a hunter chases his prey.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_106<tab>……とでも、言うと思ったか！？
ははは！　私は命を創る秘法を求め、古今の文献を渉猟せし者！
アラグの秘法についても、下手な史家よりよほど知悉している！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_107<tab>The alchemists of eld undeniably learned the secret of life eternal. But I ask you, what did this knowledge bring them? Allag still perished, as every civilization does in the fullness of time.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_107<tab>古の錬金術師らは、たしかに我らの究極の目標のひとつ……
「永遠の命」の叡智に迫ろうとしていた。
だが、忘れるな……それでも、彼らは滅亡したということを！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_108<tab>The technologists failed to understand some secret of the mortal soul. Their copies of living men will never be enough to touch upon the truth of this world.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_108<tab>彼らの魔科学には、魂の神秘についての考察を欠く面があった。
ゆえに私は、彼らの「模倣」は、探究の正道たりえぬと考える。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_109<tab>Remember, my assistant: the world is our crucible, and an alchemist makes wonders of the mundane. We may dig up the past and marvel at the miracles of the ancients, but our path is ever forward!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_109<tab>助手よ、忘れるな……万物は我らの素材、発見は日常に潜む。
過去の遺物を掘り返し、先人の軌跡を追うばかりが、
真理に到る道ではないということだ！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_200<tab>You come calling merely to see how I am faring? And to what end, might I ask? Hmph, had I not known better, I'd say you were worried all that Heartstrike business had rekindled in me the urge to try my hand once more in those most forbidden and sinister of magicks.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_200<tab>私の近況を尋ねてどうするつもりだ？
もしや、「心の臓の刃」の事件をきっかけに、
再び禁忌に手を出すのでは、などと勘ぐっているのではあるまいな？

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_201<tab>As well you might. But believe me when I say, you need worry not. Perhaps, long ago, a younger and more fool version of myself would have been tempted to do so. But this is not that time, and I am not that man.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_201<tab>だとすれば、それはいらぬ心配というもの。
……いや、一昔前の私なら、そうしていたかもしれないな。
だが、今は違う。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_202<tab>The man you see before you has learned a valuable lesson. No more will I spend my days in remembrance of and longing for those I have lost. For I have found that to devote myself to the here and now, to live for this day and the people in it, is a far more rewarding life. In that lesson, you were the master, and I the pupil.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_202<tab>今の私は、失った者のことを思い続けるよりも、
新たに出会った者に目を向ける方が、よっぽど健全だと知った。
……有能な助手のおかげでな。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_210<tab>How do I fare? You, who have traveled to the heavens and back, would know how <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> fare!? Well, to answer your question...I have been thinking.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_210<tab>私の近況を知りたいだと？
お前が天の果てなどという冗談めいた場所に行っている間に、
世界の終末について、考えを巡らせてみたのだ。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_211<tab>I imagined what I might do if the world were about to come to an end─if all the fruits of my research, all my past and future endeavors, were on the brink of annihilation...
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_211<tab>もしもこの世界に終末が訪れるとすれば、
これまで積み重ねてきた研究の成果だとか、
過去や未来の一切が無に帰すのだと考えた瞬間に……

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_212<tab>...And it appears that “despair” is not a part of my vocabulary! Such a useless, dreary emotion. Why, even if I had but moments left to exist, I would spend that time engrossed in my work!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_212<tab>…………私が絶望するとでも思ったか？　ははは！
実にくだらん！　そんな無意味な時間を過ごすくらいなら、
最後の瞬間まで、探求を続ける方が有意義だろうが！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_213<tab>In any case, I had full confidence that my ever-resourceful apprentice could render even a threat of this magnitude inert. The impossible? Pah! You bend natural law to your will on a daily basis!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_213<tab>それに、終末とやらに立ち向かっていったのは、
誰でもない、私の優秀な助手であるお前ではないか。
ならば、覆せぬ不可能などありはしないな！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_110<tab>You who have studied─some would say “suffered”─at my feet would know more of that subject than most. But I will, however, indulge your request with bemused magnanimity!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_110<tab>錬金術とは何か……それはまた深い問いだな。
そして、既に叡智のしもべたるお前にそれを語るのは、
時間の無駄すぎて、いっそ楽しいぞぅ！

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_111<tab>To properly define the intricate and miraculous work of an alchemist would take days of lengthy explanation─an explanation that many simply would not understand. The simple appellation of “potion brewer” given to us by the masses is, however, largely accurate.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_111<tab>本来、錬金術を正しく語るには、大変な時間を要する。
だが……現代においては「薬を作る者」と定義して、
ほぼ間違いなかろう。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_112<tab>Restorative salves, ability-enhancing elixirs, deadly toxins and poisons─these are all substances that can be created through our versatile and practical profession.
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_112<tab>身体を癒す薬、能力を向上させる薬、そして毒薬……。
多種多様な薬が、錬金術によって生み出される。

source: TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_113<tab>With the proper knowledge and process, even the most worthless-seeming materials can be combined to produce wondrous compounds. The applications of alchemy are nearly limitless!
target:
TEXT_REGWILALCGUILD_00067_SEVERIAN_000_113<tab>無価値に思える素材ですら、正しく理解し掛け合わせれば、
新たな可能性を得るのだ！
ふふふ……とんでもなく深いだろう？
